#include<stdio.h>
//#include<conio.h>

int main()
{
    int i=0,v=0,x=0,l=0,c=0;
    int n=0;
    int k=0,m=0;
    
    scanf("%d",&n);
    while(n!=0)
    {
               for(k=1;k<=n;k++)
               {
                                m=k%10;         
                                
                                switch(m)
                                {
                                         case 1:
                                              i++;
                                              break;
                                         case 2:
                                              i+=2;
                                               break;
                                         case 3:
                                              i+=3;
                                               break;
                                         case 4:
                                              i++;
                                              v++;
                                               break;
                                         case 5:
                                              v++;
                                               break;
                                         case 6:
                                              v++;
                                              i++;
                                               break;
                                         case 7:
                                              v++;
                                              
                                              i+=2;
                                               break;
                                         case 8:
                                              v++;
                                              i+=3;
                                               break;
                                         case 9:
                                              i++;
                                              x++;
                                               break;
                                        
                                }
                                m=k/10;
                                
                                switch(m)
                                {
                                         case 1:
                                              x++;
                                               break;
                                         case 2:
                                              x+=2;
                                               break;
                                         case 3:
                                              x+=3;
                                               break;
                                         case 4:
                                              x++;
                                              l++;
                                               break;
                                         case 5:
                                              l++;
                                               break;
                                         case 6:
                                              x++;
                                              l++;
                                               break;
                                         case 7:
                                              x+=2;
                                              l++;
                                               break;
                                         case 8:
                                              x+=3;
                                              l++;
                                               break;
                                         case 9:
                                              x++;
                                              c++;
                                               break;
                                         case 10:
                                               c++;
                                }
                         
                          
               }
               printf("%d %d %d %d %d\n",i,v,x,l,c);
               i=x=v=l=c=0;
               scanf("%d",&n);
               
    }
  //  getch();
    return 0;
}
